title: Flashing blue screen
body: I just had a game where at the start I got the blue swirl above my head which was normal and clearly indicated to be a new champ reveal but as well as at the end of my game just as I won I my screen started flashing blue. Is this yet another champion reveal hint or is it my computer acting weird I have no idea.

replies.body: just flashing blue but since i last posted it hasnt happened since

I believe you have encountered... THE BLUE SCREEN OF DEATH!

Was it just LoL that screwed up or your whole PC? Have you seen anything like it before?

How long did it last - did you have to reboot? Did it flash between LoL/desktop and a blue screen, or was it just flashing blue?

BTW: I doubt it's a teaser, if it is it sounds stupid.
